name: Bioglan Gummies Probiotic 50 Chocolate Balls
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      A 1 billion strength probiotic your children will love to take. Great tasting support for healthy tummies and strengthened immune systems.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      
    
    
      Common Uses
      Bioglan kids probiotic choc balls are for healthy tummies and immune systems. In a healthy digestive system there is a balance between "good" and "bad" bacteria. Bioglan Kids probiotic contain 500 million lactobacillus acidophillus and 500 million Bifidobacterium lactis per serve to help maintain this balance. The great taste means your kids will be encouarged to take these probitoics to keep their tummies healthy and build immunity.
    
    
      Ingredients
      Serving size 2.5g servings per package – 50 ave qty per serving: Energy  53kj( 13 Cal), protein less than 1g, Fat Total  saturated less than 1g, 26.5g, Carbohydrate –sugars 1.4g, Dietary fibre less than 1g, Sodium less than 5mg, Lactobacillus acidophilus 500 million cfu, Bifidobacterium lactis 500 million cfu 
    
    
      Directions
      Children 4 + : Take 1 probiotic ball per day.
    
    
      Indications

name: Bioglan Kids Probiotic Youghurt Balls 50
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Why recommend Bioglan Yoghurt Balls?

1 Billion good bacteria per yoghurt ball.
Made from premium Australian yoghurt.
EASY for parents to provide probiotics Immune boosting benefits to their kids.
Why the speckled appearance?

The pink and white speckles are from the 100% natural milled strawberry.
The white specs are tiny bits of milled natural strawberry seed.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions

      Bioglan Omega 3 fish Oil Kids Gummies, provide a great tasting source of Omega 3, that your children will love to take. Bioglan Gummies provide Omega 3 which is important for healthy brain and eye development. Omega 3 Gummies contain yummy strawberry, Cherry and lemon flavours.

name: Bioglan Gummies Boys Multivitamins 60 Gummies
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      A multivitamin that your little racer will love to take.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      
    
    
      Common Uses
      Bioglan Boys Multivitamin provides your boy with the essential vitamins and vegetables that he needs for healthy development. These easy to take, great tasting multivitamins provide you with a way to encourage the intake of vegetables, even for fussy eaters. The intake of vegetables from each multivitamin support everyday health including: Healthy bones Teeth gums eyes & skin.
    
    
      Ingredients
      Retinyl Palmitate (vitamin A 366 mcg) 665IU Equiv. To Retinol 200mcg, Folic Acid 50mcg, otinamide (Vitamin B3) 4.5mg, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride Equiv. To Pyriodoxine (vitamin B6) 500mcg,  Cyanocobalamin (vitamin B12) 0.25mcg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 15mg, alciferol (Vitamin D3)  50 IU 1.25mcg, Dl-alpha Tocopheral Acetate (Vitamine E) 2.5mg, Biotin 3.75mcg, Spinacia oleracea (spinach) leaf powder 5mg, Lycopersicon esculentum (tomato) fruit powder equiv. to steroidal alkaloids calculated as solaine 10mcg - 5mg, Daucus carota (Carrot) root powder 5mg, Beta vulgaris (beetroot) root powder 5mg, Cynara scolymus (artichoke) flower bud powder 5mg
    
    
      Directions
      
    
    
      Indications

To Pyriodoxine (vitamin B6) 500mcg,  Cyanocobalamin (vitamin B12) 0.25mcg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 15mg, alciferol (Vitamin D3)  50 IU 1.25mcg, Dl-alpha Tocopheral Acetate (Vitamine E) 2.5mg, Biotin 3.75mcg, Spinacia oleracea (spinach) leaf powder 5mg, Lycopersicon esculentum (tomato) fruit powder equiv. to steroidal alkaloids calculated as solaine 10mcg - 5mg, Daucus carota (Carrot) root powder 5mg, Beta vulgaris (beetroot) root powder 5mg, Cynara scolymus (artichoke) flower bud powder 5mg

name: Bioglan Kids Eye Guard Chewable 50 Tablets
chinese_name: Bioglan Kids Eye Guard Chewable 50 Tablets
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bioglan Healthy Kids Eye Guard Chewables contain three key eye health ingredients that may help protect childrens eyes from blue light damage and UV sunlight.
Bioglan Healthy Kids Eye Guard Chewable contains lutein which helps to filter blue light and acts as 'natural sunglasses' to help protect the eye from sunlight and digital device screens. Eye guard chewables are specially formulated to contain antioxidant nutrients that may help defend against free radical damage in the eye. Help protect your child's eyes from the blue light waves from digital devices with Bioglan Healthy Kids Eye Guard Chewable.
Bioglan Healthy Kids Eye Guard Chewable are a delicious Blueberry flavour which your kids will love! 
 
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Vitamins can only be of assistance if dietary vitamin intake is inadequate.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Lutein 5mgVitamin E 4.5mgBetacarotene 500mcg
    
    
      Directions
      Children 4 years and over: 1 chewable tablet per day or as advised by your healthcare professional. 
    
    
      Indications
